Classes/CancelContext.html#/s:10PromiseK.abstract: Cancel all members of the promise chain and their associated asynchronous operations.

Classes/CancelContext.html#/s:10PromiseK.name: isCancelled
Classes/CancelContext.html#/s:10PromiseK.abstract: True if all members of the promise chain have been successfully cancelled, false otherwise.

Classes/CancelContext.html#/s:10PromiseK.name: cancelAttempted
Classes/CancelContext.html#/s:10PromiseK.abstract: True if cancel has been called on the CancelContext associated with this promise, false otherwise. cancelAttempted will be true if cancel is called on any promise in the chain.

Classes/CancelContext.html#/s:10PromiseK.name: cancelledError
Classes/CancelContext.html#/s:10PromiseK.abstract: The cancellation error initialized when the promise is cancelled, or nil if not cancelled.

Classes/CancelContext.html.name: CancelContext
Classes/CancelContext.html.abstract: Keeps track of all promises in a promise chain with pending or currently running tasks, and cancels them all when cancel is called.

Other%20Classes.html#/s:10PromiseKit14Ca.name: CancelItemList
Other%20Classes.html#/s:10PromiseKit14Ca.abstract: Tracks the cancel items for a CancellablePromise. These items are removed from the associated CancelContext when the promise resolves.

Classes/CancellableFinalizer.html.name: CancellableFinalizer
Classes/CancellableFinalizer.html.abstract: Cancellable finalizer returned from catch. Use finally to specify a code block that executes when the promise chain resolves.

Classes/CancellablePromise.html.name: CancellablePromise
Classes/CancellablePromise.html.abstract: A CancellablePromise is a functional abstraction around a failable and cancellable asynchronous operation.

Classes/ConcurrencyLimitedDispatcher.htm.name: ConcurrencyLimitedDispatcher
Classes/ConcurrencyLimitedDispatcher.htm.abstract: A PromiseKit Dispatcher that allows no more than X simultaneous

Classes/RateLimitedDispatcher.html.name: RateLimitedDispatcher
Classes/RateLimitedDispatcher.html.abstract: A PromiseKit Dispatcher that dispatches X closures every Y seconds,

Classes/StrictRateLimitedDispatcher.html.name: StrictRateLimitedDispatcher
Classes/StrictRateLimitedDispatcher.html.abstract: A PromiseKit Dispatcher that dispatches no more than X closures every Y

Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.name: fulfill(_:)
Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.abstract: Fulfills the promise with the provided value

Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.name: reject(_:)
Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.abstract: Rejects the promise with the provided error

Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.name: resolve(_:)
Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.abstract: Resolves the promise with the provided result

Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.name: resolve(_:_:)
Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.abstract: Resolves the promise with the provided value or error

Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.name: resolve(_:_:)
Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.abstract: Fulfills the promise with the provided value unless the provided error is non-nil

Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.name: resolve(_:_:)
Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.abstract: Resolves the promise, provided for non-conventional value-error ordered completion handlers.

Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.name: resolve(_:)
Classes/Resolver.html#/s:10PromiseKit8Re.abstract: Fulfills the promise unless error is non-nil

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: catch(on:policy:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: catch(only:on:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects with the specific error passed in. A final catch is still required at the end of the chain.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: catch(only:on:policy:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects with an error of the type passed in. A final catch is still required at the end of the chain.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(on:policy:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(only:on:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects with the specific error passed in.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(only:on:policy:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects with an error of the type passed in.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(on:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: ensure(on:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise resolves, whether it rejects or not.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: ensureThen(on:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise resolves, whether it rejects or not.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(on:flags:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(on:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(on:policy:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(only:on:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects with the specific error passed in.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(only:on:policy:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects with an error of the type passed in.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.name: recover(on:flags:_:)
Protocols/CatchMixin.html#/s:10PromiseKi.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise rejects.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: pipe(to:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: pipe is immediately executed when this Thenable is resolved

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: result
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: The resolved result or nil if pending.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: then(on:_:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: The provided closure executes when this promise is fulfilled.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: map(on:_:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: The provided closure is executed when this promise is fulfilled.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: compactMap(on:_:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: The provided closure is executed when this promise is fulfilled.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: done(on:_:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: The provided closure is executed when this promise is fulfilled.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: get(on:_:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: The provided closure is executed when this promise is fulfilled.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: tap(on:_:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: The provided closure is executed with promise result.

Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.name: cancellize(cancelContext:)
Protocols/Thenable.html#/s:10PromiseKit8.abstract: Converts a Promise or Guarantee into a promise that can be cancelled.

Classes/Promise.html.name: Promise
Classes/Promise.html.abstract: A Promise is a functional abstraction around a failable asynchronous operation.

Classes/Guarantee.html.name: Guarantee
Classes/Guarantee.html.abstract: A Guarantee is a functional abstraction around an asynchronous operation that cannot error.

Protocols/Thenable.html.name: Thenable
Protocols/Thenable.html.abstract: Thenable represents an asynchronous operation that can be chained.

Protocols/CatchMixin.html.name: CatchMixin
Protocols/CatchMixin.html.abstract: Provides catch and recover to your object that conforms to Thenable
